Audio Description: A large black and white photograph of a hark-haired, bare-chested young man wearing blue jeans and a light colored belt using a pitchfork to move hay is shown in this poster. The young man’s figure is positioned against a bright yellow background. In bold black letters at the top of the poster are the words “Put your muscle on a war basis!” Superimposed over the image at the bottom of the poster are the words “Sign up for a farm job, at your local US employment office.”
Creator: United States. War Manpower Commission
